Title: Relates to limitations on conduit or intermediary contributions in connection with the nomination or election of any one candidate for state or local office
Summary: Relates to limitations on conduit or intermediary contributions in connection with the nomination or election of any one candidate for state or local office.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to establishing that no conduit or intermediary may contribute, loan or guarantee in excess of one thousand dollars in connection with the nomination or election of any one candidate for state or local office within the state of New York in any election cycle
